about_the_game:
Where did the reviews go?

All reviews were archived as part of the transition to the new pay-to-play model. Unfortunately, this reset is required by Steam. If you’ve purchased and enjoyed Party Quiz, I’d greatly appreciate it if you left a new review. Your feedback not only supports the game but also helps new players discover it

What's Party Quiz?

Party Quiz is a new way of playing trivia quizzes with your friends and family. If you've always wanted to test your knowledge with those close to you, now is your chance!

Play and enjoy with friends from the comfort of your sofa with your favorite pizza. No chance to get together offline? No problem! You can always play online and get just as much fun, plus more pizza for you.

The game requires a minimum of 3 players, one of whom becomes the Host, and participants are the Players. Before the game, the Host creates in the built-in Party Quiz Constructor pack of questions on various topics. No time to do it? Use Steam Workshop to start the game with the pack created by the community, filtering them by different difficulty levels and/or included topics.

So, the questions are ready, the battle for the title of the smartest pants owner begins! Earn points with correct answers and move to the top of the leaderboard. Test your intellect and surprise your opponents by answering the most diverse and sometimes unpredictable questions the fastest.

  • Party Quiz lets you spend a great evening with your family and friends;

  • Everyone can try to be both a Player and the Host,with fun avatars to choose from;;

  • Be a part of the Party Quiz community and exchange questions with other players via Steam Workshop;

  • Challenge your skills in different areas of knowledge.

How to Play Remotely

To join the game, players just need a web-enabled device like a smartphone or tablet. When playing with remote friends, you can use video conferencing tools like Zoom, Steam Broadcast, Google Hangouts, Discord, or similar platforms to stay connected. Simply share your screen during the call with Party Quiz launched and remember to share audio when prompted!

Note: This is a same-room multiplayer game; only the host needs to have the game for a group to play.

short_description: Play a local Quiz game with your friends. Create your own Quiz using the Party Quiz Constructor or use the Steam Workshop to download one of the Quizzes made by the community. A fun way to test your knowledge!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Italian*, Ukrainian*, Turkish*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
